PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2009-03512009-03-05,  HERITAGE,  ,  , 
ActMuseums Act
PrecisApproval of the appointment by the Minister of Canadian Heritage of KEN LANGILLE of New Glasgow, Nova Scotia, as a trustee of the Board of Trustees of the Canadian Museum of Civilization to hold office during pleasure for a term of four years, in the place of Claudia Simon.
AttachmentsAttachment
